content: not distribute i worked hard on it questions you can reach me on ravelry or at kinglouiespizza@gmail com 1 stitch guide k1 p1 ribbing even number of sts round 1 k1 p1 to end repeat round 1 for pattern instructions scarf first ribbed edge with color designated for edge and smaller circular needle cast on 200 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist work in k1 p1 ribbing for 1 25 main scarf break yarn join next color work onto larger needle set-up round k99 p1 pm k99 p1 repeat this round throughout the main scarf work 3 more rnds in the current color break yarn join next color work 4 rnds continue making stripes for as long as your heart desires once you ve had enough knit the last ribbed edge this is actually a joke but if you wear it as a dress i d suggest shortening the scarf to an last ribbed edge appropriate length break yarn join color designated for edge working onto smaller needle knit 1 round work in k1 p1 ribbing for 1 25 bind off all sts in patt finishing make sure all colors are securely knotted together trim ends to about 1 weave in cast-on and bind-off tails lightly block scarf abbreviations k knit p purl pm place marker round round st s stitch es st st stockinette stitch © amy gunderson ~ this pattern is for personal use please do not distribute i worked hard on it questions you can reach me on ravelry or at kinglouiespizza@gmail com 2
